title: Polyvine 5030777000618 Varnish, Clear Dead Flat 500ml
features: WAX FINISH VARNISH: A unique traditional wax-like, brush-on, protective varnish, for a high-performance satin or non-reflective finish. It combines the silky feel of wax with the durability of a varnish - reminiscent of the traditional feel of preserved furniture. Covers 15-20 square metres per litre

EASY APPLICATION: Ensure the product is well mixed but don’t shake. Apply sparingly, brush out well using a good quality brush, following the direction of the grain. On new wood and porous surfaces, dilute the first coat 10% with water. Apply the first coat and allow to dry for 1-2 hours

SUITABLE FOR: Whether it's for professional use or a DIY project, the wax varnish keeps surfaces free of stains. It’s water and heat resistant. This microporous varnish is ideal for use on bookshelves, new wood, furniture, doors, staircases, wood, MDF, fire surrounds, and kitchen cabinets

THE PERFECT FINISH: Choose from our range of high-performance wax varnish and finishes to protect and enhance the home. Our Wax Finish Varnish is available in 3 finishes - Dead Flat and Satin and Coloured Satin. It comes in 100ml, 500ml and 1L

VARNISH EXPERTS FOR THE TRADE: With over 35 years of expertise in high quality coatings, Polyvine is a trusted provider of high-performance finishes for the trade professional. If you are looking for a professional, durable result, choose Polyvine, varnish experts for the trade and specialists in high quality finishes
description: Polyvine Wax Finish Varnish - Water Resistant Clear Varnish - Seals & Protects Interior Wood, Kitchen Cabinets, Shelving & Wood Panelling A unique, clear varnish that combines the silky feel of wax with the durability of a varnish reminiscent of the traditional feel of preserved furniture. It retains the natural appearance of wood. The Polyvine Wax Finish Varnish keeps surfaces free from stains, scuffing and colour fading. Unique qualities - interior, 1-2 hours drying time, water resistant, heat resistant, abrasion resistant, microporous, water wash up. Ideal for - new wood, furniture, kitchen cabinets, staircases, paintwork, wood and MDF, fire surrounds, bookshelves 3 High-Performance Finishes Satin - If you're looking for a subtle sheen, then our Satin finish is the one for you. Perfect for a beautiful soft finish. Dead Flat - Polyvine is the specialist in the production of high-performance, Dead Flat varnishes. It’s ideal if you’re looking for a completely non-reflective, matte surface. Coloured Satin - A coloured satin finish to transform wood producing a subtle even shade. Application and advice All surfaces must be clean and free from dust, dirt, oil and contamination. Ensure the product is well mixed but do not shake. Apply sparingly, brush out well using a good quality brush, following the direction of the grain. Apply the first coat and allow it to dry, then apply a apply a second coat. Polyvine - Varnish Experts for the Trade Increased levels of protection for the home, Polyvine products are perfect for the trade expert as well as the DIY enthusiast. Simple to use, extremely effective and designed with the perfect finish in mind. A range of finishes to add protection, durability and long lasting quality.
